languages.text: {n}Голос, что отвечает ей — не голос человека. Таким голосом мог бы говорить огромный пустотный корабль или мир-кузня.{/n} "Ты нарушила процедуру, Скепсис. Присвоила себе чужую функцию. Ты лишь оспариваешь, но не решаешь. Я — решаю".

{n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос, что отвечает ей — не голос человека. Таким голосом мог бы говорить огромный пустотный корабль или мир-кузня.{/n} "Ты нарушила процедуру, Скепсис. Присвоила себе чужую функцию. Ты лишь оспариваешь, но не решаешь. Я — решаю".

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or a forge-world, if they were to speak.{/n} "You violated the procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I make them."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or a forge-world, if they were to speak.{/n} "You violated the procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I make them."

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼女に答える声は人間のものではない。巨大なヴォイドシップや工業惑星が言葉を発せるなら、このような感じだろう。{/n}「手順違反だ、スケプティシズム。お前は他の機能を損なった。お前は異議を申し立てるのみで、意思決定はしない。それは自分の役目だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女に答える声は人間のものではない。巨大なヴォイドシップや工業惑星が言葉を発せるなら、このような感じだろう。{/n}「手順違反だ、スケプティシズム。お前は他の機能を損なった。お前は異議を申し立てるのみで、意思決定はしない。それは自分の役目だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}回答她的声音不像是人类的声音，更像是巨大的虚空舰或铸造世界发出来的声音，如果它们有声音的话。{/n}“你违反了程序，‘怀疑’。你剥夺了别人的功能。你这只是在挑战权威，你无权做决定，决定权在我手中。”
languages.original_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."

traits.locale_text: {n}回答她的声音不像是人类的声音，更像是巨大的虚空舰或锻造世界发出来的声音，如果它们有声音的话。{/n}“你违反了程序，‘怀疑’。你剥夺了别人的功能。你这只是在挑战权威，你无权做决定，决定权在我手中。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix qui lui répond, en revanche, n'a rien d'humain. Elle pourrait appartenir à un vaisseau spatial géant ou à un monde forge, si l'un ou l'autre pouvait parler.{/n} « Vous avez enfreint la procédure, scepticisme. Vous avez usurpé les fonctions d'un autre. Vous êtes là pour remettre en doute, mais c'est à moi qu'il revient de prendre les décisions. »
languages.original_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix qui lui répond, en revanche, n'a rien d'humain. Elle pourrait appartenir à un vaisseau spatial géant ou à un monde-forge, si l'un ou l'autre pouvait parler.{/n} « Vous avez enfreint la procédure, scepticisme. Vous avez usurpé les fonctions d'un autre. Vous êtes là pour remettre en doute, mais c'est à moi qu'il revient de prendre les décisions. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz que responde no es humana, podría provenir de una nave del vacío gigante o a un mundo forja si estos pudieran hablar.{/n} «Violaste el procedimiento, Escepticismo. Asumiste el rol de otro. Te limitas a cuestionar; no tomas decisiones. Yo soy el que las toma».
languages.original_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz que responde no es humana, podría provenir de una nave del vacío gigante o a un mundo forja si estos pudieran hablar.{/n} «Violaste el procedimiento, Escepticismo. Asumiste el rol de otro. Te limitas a cuestionar; no tomas decisiones. Yo soy el que las toma».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme, die antwortet, ist nicht ihre menschliche Stimme. Sie könnte einem riesigen Raumschiff oder einer Fabrikwelt gehören, wenn sie sprechen könnten.{/n} "Ihr verletzt die Prozedur, Skepsis. Ihr habt die Funktion eines anderen usurpiert. Ihr fordert nur heraus; Ihr trefft keine Entscheidungen. Ich treffe sie."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme, die antwortet, ist nicht ihre menschliche Stimme. Sie könnte einem riesigen Raumschiff oder einer Fabrikwelt gehören, wenn sie sprechen könnten.{/n} "Ihr verletzt die Prozedur, Skepsis. Ihr habt die Funktion eines anderen usurpiert. Ihr fordert nur heraus; Ihr trefft keine Entscheidungen. Ich treffe sie."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ona yanıt veren ses, bir insana ait değil. Böyle bir yetileri olsa bir uçsuz gemisi veya döküm dünyası konuşuyor sanılırdı.{/n} "Prosedürü ihlal ettin Kuşkuculuk. Bir diğerinin fonksiyonunu gasbettin. Sen yalnızca meydan okursun, karar vermezsin. Kararları ben veririm."
languages.original_text: {n}The voice that answers her is no human voice. It could belong to a giant voidship or forge world, if they could speak.{/n} "You violated procedure, Scepticism. You usurped the function of another. You challenge only; you do not make decisions. I do."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ona yanıt veren ses, bir insana ait değil. Eğer konuşabilselerdi bir uçsuz gemisine veya bir döküm dünyasına ait olabilirdi:{/n} "Prosedürü ihlal ettin Kuşkuculuk. Bir diğerinin fonksiyonunu gasbettin. Sen yalnızca meydan okursun, sen karar vermezsin. Ben veririm."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
